attributes.action: Have smoking and Non Smoking Pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The non smokers are not going out more, the pubs and clubs are only half as full as they used to be - businesses are losing money and nights out are just not the same. If we have non smoking and smoking pubs people can then decide for themselves where they want to go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
